name: Round Lettuce (Butterhead/Butter Lettuce)
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - greens category
Soft, tender leaves ideal for lettuce cups
Rich in vitamins A, K, and folate
benefits: Round lettuce (butterhead or butter lettuce) has approximately 96% water content, making it one of the most water-rich vegetables available. Its soft, cup-shaped leaves make it ideal for holding salad mixtures, as featured in the cookbook's Lettuce Cups recipe. As an aboveground vegetable highest on the water scale, it's perfect for optimizing weight loss meals.
amount: 8 to 10 whole leaves round lettuce for cups

quotes: small, soft lettuce leaves make the best cups for holding the salad
